issue.title: [Java] Make field vectors final explicitly
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6366](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6366). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
According to the discussion in <https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/836d3b87ccb6e65e9edf0f220829a29edfa394fc2cd1e0866007d86e@%3Cdev.arrow.apache.org%3E,> field vectors should not be extended, so they should be made final explicitly.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6366?focusedCommentId=16932045) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5204
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5204>
